message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Your starting point wasn't unreasonable, but I think a fair split is the best way to start.  Let's make a deal and get our money!
I see you want a fair split, but I think I can do a bit better. Meet me in the middle of my first offer and your fair split?
This is a negotiation, Alice. I'm trying to meet you halfway, let's compromise and end this.
You're getting closer, but I still think I deserve a bit more. Let's try this and end the game.
Alice, let's be realistic. We're running out of time.  This is a generous offer and a chance to end this now.
I see the pressure of time, but I still believe I can get a bit more. This is my most reasonable offer yet.
Alice, this is it. Take it or leave it. We're down to the wire and this is the best you're going to get. Let's be smart and walk away with something.
